channel.title: Website on Josh Nygaard
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Josh Nygaard

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post on my first very own live, publically accessible website! I hope you all like it. The goal of this site is to demonstrate to myself that I have the capabilities to create a public-facing website by myself. In future posts I will discuss the steps and decision I made in the development of this site But at the moment I’m just excited to get it live!
